Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experience. Given its high-quality craftsmanship and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all its benefits, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $200. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
